headline: Major Regional Bank Industry Healthy: 4 Stocks to Gain in 2025
summary: High funding costs and poor asset quality will hurt the Zacks Major Regional Banks. Yet, interest rate cuts, decent loan demand, solid economic growth and business restructuring will likely aid industry players like USB, TFC, BK and NTRS.

raw.headline: Major Regional Bank Industry Healthy: 4 Stocks to Gain in 2025
